Scripts.name: GetBeforeHalfHourFreeLobbySessionEmba
Scripts.cmd: SELECT fls_sn,[type],fls_class_name,attend_date FROM [muchnewdb].[dbo].[cfg_free_lobby_session_emba] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE valid = 1 AND ([Type] > 544 OR [TYPE] < 544) AND SendSmsState IS NULL AND attend_date >= GETDATE() AND DATEADD(HOUR, -6, attend_date) <= GETDATE()

Scripts.name: UpdateSendSmsStatebyFlsSnList
Scripts.cmd: UPDATE [dbo].[cfg_free_lobby_session_emba] SET SendSmsState = @SendSmsState WHERE fls_sn IN @fls_snList

Scripts.name: GetFreeLobbySessionEmbabyType
Scripts.cmd: SELECT * FROM [dbo].[free_lobby_session_emba] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Type In @Types

ConnectionStrings.NorthwindConnection: Data Source=(LocalDb)\v11.0;Initial Catalog=Northwind;User ID=NorthWindss;Password=123456; Application Name=Northwind; Connection Timeout=300;
